channel.title: Jason Antman's Blog - important businessweek vista iphone products

item.title: Commentary - Best Products, or most hype?
item.description: In my usual lunchtime Digg reading, I came by a link to the BusinessWeek Most Important Products of 2007. Given the number of cars, it’s apparent that this is a very consumer-oriented listing. But I was a bit surprised - the first four products were all from Apple - the iPhone …
item.dc:creator: admin
